attributes.action: NHS staff and Armed Forces, not to pay Income Tax during the Coronavirus.
attributes.additional_details: The only authority that can implement this is the government. This would be a great reward for all their hard work and for placing themselves in the firing line.
attributes.background: No tax to be paid by NHS and Armed Forces during the Coronavirus. This needs to happen as the rest of the population are getting a benefit but the front line staff are not.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
